function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Unknown relationship between green spaces and sars-cov-2 infection rates","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconclusive findings from existing studies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for green spaces as a mitigating factor for sars-cov-2 infection","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the characteristics and optimal buffer distance of green space exposure for reducing sars-cov-2 infection rates","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to implement frequent handwashing and barrier measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of structured programme for instruction and education on public health measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate isolation of people with suspected respiratory tract infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with low-cost interventions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective evaluation of global and resource-intensive measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited capability for long-term maintenance of strict hygiene and barrier routines","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Varying measurement units and missing standard deviations may lead to inaccurate data analysis and conclusions.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited evidence for the effectiveness of barrier devices like n95 masks over simple surgical masks.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confounding additional routines may affect the interpretation of the effectiveness of interventions such as adding virucidals or antiseptics to normal handwashing.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for confounding in studies evaluating reduced transmission of respiratory viruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High transmission of sars epidemic in china, singapore, and vietnam in 2003","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate blinding or adjustment for confounders in study design","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inappropriate interventions and comparison causing problems with study designs","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Compliance issues with interventions, especially educational programmes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or no reporting of key data randomisation, blinding, numerators and denominators, interventions, outcomes, attrition of participants, confidence intervals, cluster coefficients .","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Confusion between cohort design and before-and-after design, leading to unsupported conclusions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential biases such as cash incentives given to participants.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Presence of potential confounders in non-randomised studies affecting the accuracy of results.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent data extraction and aggregation leading to unreliable pooled estimates.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of vaccines and antivirals from the study","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No language restrictions applied to study search","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High incidence rates of respiratory viruses during major epidemics worldwide","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Serious pandemic viral infections such as sars and avian influenza","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of single measures such as vaccines or antivirals in interrupting the spread of influenza","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for understanding human behavior at individual and collective levels","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear and targeted messaging in different regions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on complex multidimensional mobility index data","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid development of data resource without comprehensive planning","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Open collaboration between research institutions and public authorities may lead to unfiltered or unverified data being used in decision-making processes.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of division of agreed goals between research institutions and public authorities may lead to conflicting priorities and objectives in the development of public monitoring programmes.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proactive agile development of the covid-19 dashboard without proper planning may result in incomplete or inaccurate data representation.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Abnormal concentrations of traffic outside supermarkets and health-care facilities.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Capture of changing patterns of traffic, pedestrian, and other activity away from the city centre.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in air pollution and improvement in environmental indices such as nitrogen dioxide.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data integration for specific covid-19 impacts","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Close collaboration with local authorities and citizen partners may increase the risk of disease transmission if proper health and safety measures are not followed.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Publication of real-time urban movement data and covid-19 dashboard may lead to public panic or misinformation if not presented and interpreted accurately.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neoliberal surveillance mechanism through big data","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 crisis management using iot and smart city data","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of covid-19 transmission in the workplace due to close interaction among workforce, design team, contractors, clients, stakeholders, and supply chain.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Short-term cash flow issues due to economic lockdown and reduced business activities.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cross-sector collaboration","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of crisis management skills","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of crisis-response leadership programs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance to cultural change","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential delay of infrastructure projects","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
